text: "Austin Prison" is a song written by Johnny Cash and originally recorded by him on Columbia Records for his 1966 novelty album Everybody Loves a Nut. It was first released in May 1966 as the flip side to the second single (Columbia 4-43673, "Everybody Loves a Nut" / "Austin Prison") from the yet-to-be- released album. == Lyrical analysis == == Track listing == == References == == External links == * "Austin Prison" on the Johnny Cash official website Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:1966 singles Category:Columbia Records singles Category:1966 songs Category:Songs written by Johnny Cash Category:Country music songs
title: Austin Prison
